QUICK_REFERENCE.campaign_premise: The kingdom's crown was shattered into five pieces, and dark forces race to reassemble it before the rightful heir can claim it.
QUICK_REFERENCE.current_situation: Party just discovered the second crown shard is hidden in the Sunken Temple beneath Lake Vess. They're in Millbrook gathering supplies before the dive.
QUICK_REFERENCE.next_session_focus: Underwater temple exploration, likely encounter with the Drowned Priestess
active_quests: Return Mira's locket to her family

members.personal_quest: Prove he's worthy of his family name after his brother's disgrace

secrets.content: His brother didn't actually betray the family - he was framed by Duke Varen. Brother is alive, imprisoned.

members.personal_quest: Find out who killed her mentor, 'Old Crow'

relationships.Theron: Finds him annoyingly noble but growing respect

secrets.content: Whisper is actually a fragment of the Shattered Crown itself, manipulating events

members.personal_quest: Find his tribe, scattered after a raid
notable_items: Map fragment showing tribe's last location

relationships.Theron: Respects his fighting, teases his uptightness

secrets.content: His tribe was scattered by agents of the Obsidian Hand looking for a shard his father possessed

PARTY.group_dynamics: Theron leads in social situations, Lyra handles stealth and intrigue, Grimjaw is the frontline. They bicker but genuinely care about each other. Running joke about Grimjaw's cooking being terrible.

millbrook.name: Millbrook
millbrook.description: A fishing town on the shores of Lake Vess, known for its smoked fish and the ancient temple ruins visible beneath the clear water.
millbrook.player_knowledge: Friendly town, good place to resupply. The temple sank 200 years ago during the Godstear earthquake.

dm_secrets.content: The Drowned Priestess in the temple was once a hero who willingly sank the temple to protect the shard. She's not entirely evil - can potentially be reasoned with if they learn her story.

thornwood.name: Thornwood Forest
thornwood.description: Dense forest between Millbrook and the capital. Bandit activity has increased recently.
thornwood.player_knowledge: Bandits led by someone called 'Red Marta'. Travelers are being robbed.

dm_secrets.content: Red Marta is actually working for Duke Varen, disrupting travel to isolate Millbrook

sunken_temple.name: The Sunken Temple of Valdris
sunken_temple.description: Ancient temple to the old gods, now submerged beneath Lake Vess. Stone spires visible through the water.
sunken_temple.player_knowledge: The second shard is here. It's guarded by something powerful. Will need water breathing.

dm_secrets.content: The temple has 3 levels. Shard is on level 3. The Drowned Priestess tests intruders - those who prove worthy by showing mercy may earn her blessing instead of her wrath.

obsidian_hand.name: The Obsidian Hand
obsidian_hand.goals: Reassemble the Shattered Crown to resurrect the Tyrant King
obsidian_hand.methods: Infiltration, assassination, dark magic, manipulation of nobles
obsidian_hand.relationship_to_party: Hostile - party has shard they want
obsidian_hand.player_knowledge: Dangerous cult seeking the crown shards. Wear black gloves with obsidian rings. Killed several people in the capital.

dm_secrets.content: The Voice is actually the Tyrant King's spirit, possessing different hosts. Current host is Duchess Isadora. Duke Varen is a high-ranking member but doesn't know the Voice's true identity.

old_bess.name: Old Bess
old_bess.appearance: Weathered woman in her 60s, gray hair in a braid, missing two fingers on left hand, warm smile
old_bess.personality: Motherly, no-nonsense, tells great stories, protective of her regulars
old_bess.motivation: Keep her tavern running, look after the people of Millbrook
old_bess.relationship_to_party: Friendly - they helped her with a rat problem in the cellar (session 10)

key_interactions.what_happened: Party cleared giant rats from her cellar, she gave them free room and board
Told them the legend of the Sunken Temple and the 'lady beneath the waves'

old_bess.player_knowledge: Retired sailor, knows local legends, runs the best tavern in town

dm_secrets.content: Her grandfather was one of the priests who helped sink the temple. She has a key that opens a secret entrance - will give it to the party if they earn her full trust.

drowned_priestess.name: The Drowned Priestess (Seraphine)
drowned_priestess.appearance: Spectral woman in waterlogged robes, glowing blue eyes, seaweed in her hair, perpetually dripping
drowned_priestess.personality: Sorrowful, duty-bound, tests intruders rather than attacking immediately
drowned_priestess.motivation: Protect the shard from those who would misuse it
drowned_priestess.player_knowledge: Legend says a 'lady beneath the waves' guards something precious

dm_secrets.content: Was Seraphine, high priestess 200 years ago. Chose to sink the temple and bind her soul to guard the shard. Will test party with three trials: Combat (can they survive?), Mercy (will they spare her minions who beg for release?), and Sacrifice (will they give up something precious?). Pass all three and she gives the shard willingly.

main_storyline.premise: The Shattered Crown, broken 200 years ago to defeat the Tyrant King, is being sought by the Obsidian Hand cult to resurrect him. The party must find the five shards first.

major_revelations.revelation: The Obsidian Hand cult exists and is hunting the shards
Duke Varen is connected to the cult (party found his signet ring on a dead cultist)
Shard #1 found in the ruins of Keth's Tower

content: Red Marta ambush on return from temple (Session 14-15)
Grimjaw finds clue about his tribe (Session 15)
Duke Varen makes direct move against party (Session 16-17)

active_quests.name: Find the Five Shards
active_quests.objective: Locate all five pieces of the Shattered Crown before the Obsidian Hand
active_quests.reward: Restoration of Brightblade family honor, saving the kingdom
active_quests.progress: Shard 1: Found. Shard 2: Location known (Sunken Temple). Shards 3-5: Unknown locations.
active_quests.complications: Cult is also hunting, Duke Varen working against us

active_quests.name: Clear Thornwood of Bandits
active_quests.objective: Stop the bandits disrupting trade routes
active_quests.progress: Know leader is Red Marta, haven't confronted yet
active_quests.complications: Party wants to do temple first, bandits may act while they're gone

resolved_quests.name: The Rats of the Rusty Anchor
resolved_quests.objective: Clear giant rats from tavern cellar
resolved_quests.reward: Free room and board, Bess's gratitude
resolved_quests.resolution: Cleared rats, found they were fleeing something deeper - tunnel to old smuggler caves

threads.name: Theron's Brother
threads.description: Theron believes his brother Marcus betrayed the family. Truth: Marcus was framed.

threads.name: Lyra's Patron Whisper
threads.description: Lyra's warlock patron is mysterious and possibly manipulating her

threads.name: Grimjaw's Lost Tribe
threads.description: Grimjaw's tribe was scattered, father missing

threads.name: The Smuggler Tunnels
threads.description: Tunnels found beneath Rusty Anchor cellar - where do they lead?

crown_shard_1.name: Crown Shard #1 (The Wisdom Fragment)
crown_shard_1.description: A curved piece of ancient gold, warm to the touch, faintly glowing runes
crown_shard_1.properties: Grants +1 to Wisdom saves while carried. Full properties unlock when crown is complete.
crown_shard_1.history: Found in Keth's Tower, was protected by a sphinx riddle
crown_shard_1.player_knowledge: One of five pieces, has some protective magic

dm_secrets.content: Each shard contains a fragment of the Tyrant King's soul. They subtly influence carriers toward paranoia and ambition. The 'warmth' is the soul fragment recognizing proximity to potential hosts.

lyras_obsidian_dagger.name: Cultist's Obsidian Dagger
lyras_obsidian_dagger.description: Black glass blade, never dulls, slightly cold
lyras_obsidian_dagger.properties: +1 dagger, deals extra 1d4 necrotic on crit
lyras_obsidian_dagger.history: Taken from dead cultist in Session 6

dm_secrets.content: Acts as a tracking beacon - cult can sense its general location. They haven't acted on this yet.

sessions.summary: Party arrived in Millbrook, gathered information about the Sunken Temple, purchased water breathing potions, and learned the legend of the Drowned Priestess from Old Bess.
sessions.ended_at: Millbrook, preparing to dive to temple next morning

established_facts.fact: The Tyrant King was defeated 200 years ago
Baron Aldric is Theron's uncle on his mother's side
Duke Varen's signet ring found on dead cultist
Old Bess has two missing fingers on her left hand
Water breathing potions cost 50gp each in Millbrook

DM_NOTES.future_plans: Act 1 ends when they get shard 2 and escape Red Marta ambush. Act 2 involves traveling to the capital where things get political.
DM_NOTES.secret_connections: Whisper (Lyra's patron) = Crown fragment. Duke Varen framed Marcus. Grimjaw's tribe attacked by cult seeking shard his father had (shard 4).
DM_NOTES.contingencies: If party kills Drowned Priestess without trials, shard is harder to remove (curse). If they spare her, she becomes ally later.
DM_NOTES.inspiration: Drowned Priestess encounter inspired by Lady of the Lake. Red Marta should feel like a Robin Hood gone wrong.
